author: felipeal
msg: updated relase numbers - thanks Dhiru Pandey for realizing they were wrong
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'standard-112'.

author: horwat
msg: Standard 1.1.2 release documentation update. The following files should be updated for a new release:
- make sure notes are up to date with changes since last release
- manifest needs to be updated with version
- news item that will appear on Standard project page
- news item that will appear on main Taglibs page

author: horwat
msg: NOTE: With JSTL 1.1 Commons EL needs to be modified to address this issue. The JSP EG should be involved in determining the best caching mechanism
Copied Jakarta Commons Collections LRUMap implementation and dependencies. ELEvaluator now uses an LRU Map. The map size can be customized using a context initialization parameter.

author: horwat
msg: Close result set created in update tag. It is good programming practive to close statements as soon as they are finished even though they will also be closed when the connection that created them is closed.
